functions.tag: {pages:['{"text":"Reinforcement of the Warbow:\\n\\n1x Morbex Warbow\\n16x Sculk Catalysts\\n1x Netherite Ingot\\n1x Soul Shard\\n\\nAll materials need to be put together on a fully charged Respawn Anchor."}'],title:"Reinforcement - Warbow",author:unknown,generation:1,display:{Lore:["Warbow"]}}
